title: Cannot synchronize .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file with another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer, the synchronization process fails.
OB: The synchronization process fails when attempting to synchronize a .java file with another resource in the package viewer.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer.
